meanings: (답·계산·사실 등이) (잘못되다) be wrong, be incorrect, be mistaken; (잘못하다) make a mistake (in), commit[make] an error (in)

vlive.korean: [맞다, 틀리다 아직 대답을 하지 않은 제작진] - 뷔, 뷔, 뷔! - 아니... [The staff hasn't told them whether j-hope is correct or not] - V, V! - I mean... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.98
vlive.english: [The staff hasn't told them whether j-hope is correct or not] - V, V! - I mean...

vlive.korean: '목소리 너무 틀리다' 그렇죠, 재미있죠? "Your voice changed a lot." Yeah~ It's funny, right? 듣기 View video YGK+ : Holly Moly 어눌어눌하다닝! 모델 이호정
vlive.english: "Your voice changed a lot." Yeah~ It's funny, right?

vlive.korean: 그러면 거기에 '맞다 틀리다' 를 조정석 씨가 대답하시면 됩니다. And then you will answer by saying either a "yes" or "no". 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 조정석 배우를 만나다 Live
vlive.english: And then you will answer by saying either a "yes" or "no".

examples.korean: Answer the following question true or false. 발음듣기 다음 문제에 '맞다' 또는 '틀리다'로 답하시오 Neungyule
examples.english: Answer the following question true or false. 발음

examples.korean: Some people may find that the film is totally different from the novel,' the director said. 발음듣기 일부의 사람들은 이 영화가 소설과 판이하게 틀 리다라고 생각할지도 모른다'라고 감독은 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Some people may find that the film is totally different from the novel,' the director said. 발음

examples.korean: The measure is wrong. 발음듣기 됫수가 틀리다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
Though phonetically alike, they are written with different ideographs. 발음듣기 소리는 같지만 글자가 틀리다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: Though phonetically alike, they are written with different ideographs. 발음

examples.korean: They differ much in the quality 발음듣기 그들 질이 매우 틀리다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: They differ much in the quality 발음
